data.description: Software Engineer - Full-StackNew York, NY / Los Angeles, CA / Austin, TXEngineering, Product, Design ‚Äì Software Engineering /Full-time /On-siteApply for this jobAbout NominalNominal is building the software infrastructure powering the world‚Äôs most advanced hardware systems ‚Äî from spacecraft and autonomous vehicles to next-generation industrial machines. Our platform ingests high-rate telemetry, validates complex autonomy software in real time, and enables engineers to iterate faster without sacrificing safety or precision. We‚Äôre a small, fast-moving team of engineers and operators who own problems end-to-end, work across disciplines, and thrive on challenges at the intersection of hardware and software.As a dual-use platform, we serve top-tier commercial and defense customers, including the U.S. Navy, United States Air Force, Shield AI, and Anduril. We‚Äôre backed by Sequoia, General Catalyst, Founders Fund, Lux Capital, and Lightspeed Ventures. Our team draws experience from SpaceX, Palantir, Anduril, Applied Intuition, and other leading companies ‚Äî united by a common mission: enabling hardware engineers to push the boundaries of advanced technology with speed, safety, and precision.Join Nominal as a Full-Stack Engineer and help build a product that powers how hardware engineers interact and validate complex, high-volume telemetry. You‚Äôll work across the stack, from scalable back-end services that can compute and transform telemetry data to complex, highly performant web interfaces. You‚Äôll collaborate closely with product, design, and infrastructure teams, shaping intuitive, reliable, and data-driven experiences from database to user interface. Ideal candidates have 3+ years of full-stack experience, an ability to reason through complex system architecture, a strong eye for intuitive UX for complex workflows, and a passion for turning technical challenges into seamless, impactful tools.üöÄ About the roleBuild and enhance frontend features: Develop end-to-end functionality using modern frameworks like React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.jsDesign for scalability and performance: Architect reliable systems and APIs that handle large, real-time datasets efficiently. Optimize both frontend and backend performance to deliver fast, seamless user experiences under heavy load.Collaborate across disciplines: Work closely with product, design, and engineering teams to validate designs, integrate APIs such as tRPC, and deliver features that are both technically sound and user-centric.Drive technical excellence: Contribute to the architecture and direction of our platform, mentor early-career engineers, and stay current with emerging technologies in data and system design to continuously improve our stack.‚ö° Skills that accelerate usFull-Stack Expertise: 3+ years of experience in React, Next.js and TypeScript, and/or backend experience in Java, Go, or Rust.System Design & APIs: Skilled in building scalable distributed systems and integrating RESTful or GraphQL APIs.Performance & Data: Experienced optimizing large, real-time datasets and ensuring smooth, responsive interfaces.UI & Visualization: Familiarity with Tailwind CSS, Radix UI, data visualization tools, and WebGL experience are a plus.Collaboration: Communicates clearly across technical and non-technical teams.‚ú® Benefits/Perksüè• 100% coverage of medical, dental, and vision insuranceüèñÔ∏è Unlimited PTO and sick leaveüçΩÔ∏è Free lunch, snacks, and coffeeüöÄ Professional Development Stipend‚úàÔ∏è Annual company retreat$130,000 - $230,000 a yearThis job description is written to capture a range of experience levels from 2 years to 15+ years, which is why you‚Äôll see a wide band listed. Your actual base salary will be determined on a case-by-case basis and may vary based on a range of considerations, including job-related knowledge and skills, education, prior experience, and other business needs. The listed salary range represents an estimate for base compensation only. Base salary is just one part of the total rewards package. Eligible employees may also receive highly competitive equity grants in the form of stock options, allowing you to share in the company‚Äôs long-term success.All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, or national origin. ITAR RequirementsTo conform to U.S. Government export regulations, applicant must be a (i) U.S. citizen or national, (ii) U.S. lawful, permanent resident (aka green card holder), (iii) Refugee under 8 U.S.C. ¬ß 1157, or (iv) Asylee under 8 U.S.C. ¬ß 1158, or be eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State. Learn more about the ITAR here.We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.Apply for this job
